issue.message: This LinearLayout should use `android:layout_width="wrap_content"`

Declaring a broadcastreceiver for `android.net.conn.CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE` is deprecated for apps targeting N and higher. In general, apps should not rely on this broadcast and instead use `JobScheduler` or `GCMNetworkManager`.
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
This custom view should extend `android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatImageView` instead
This custom view should extend `android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatImageView` instead
This custom view should extend `android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextView` instead
Avoid using + in version numbers; can lead to unpredictable and unrepeatable builds (io.fabric.tools:gradle:1.+)
Formatting %d followed by words ("more"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("games"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Exported content providers can provide access to potentially sensitive data
Exported service does not require permission
Exported service does not require permission
Avoid object allocations during draw/layout operations (preallocate and reuse instead)
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `SyncAdapter` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak (and also breaks Instant Run)
